data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Jalal-Abad, Kyrgyzstan a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jalal-Abad, Kyrgyzstan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Jalal-Abad to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 64 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Jalal-Abad, Kyrgyzstan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, bring yourself glory in Jalal-Abad. Through your servants plant 186 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Jalal-Abad, Kyrgyzstan into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Lyuli people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Lyuli people know you.
Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Jalal-Abad access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 930,600 people living in Jalal-Abad through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,815 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

location.name: Jalal-Abad
location.people_groups_list: Pashtun, Northern, Arab, Uzbeki, Tuerke, Hemshin, Hui, Muslim Chinese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Pashtun, Northern (600), Arab, Uzbeki (400), Tuerke (300), Hemshin (1,100), Hui, Muslim Chinese (2,000)
